page.title: 01THE AREA OF PENISTONE.
page.content: The twelve squares which the 2nd year pupils from Penistone Grammar School surveyed contained these areas: Oxspring,Springvale,Hoylandswaine,Cubl ey and Penistone itself. Situated in the{local government areas}of Barnsley Metropolitan Council and South Yorkshire County Council Penistone lies on the western edge of the Peninne Hills. Two{main roads}run through, A629 Sheffield-Huddersfield and A628 Sheffield-Manchester (Woodhead Pass). The{elevation}ofthe district is 600-1600ft. The{population of Penistone and district is 8000-9000. The{housing}dates mostly from late 19th early 20th century but there are quite a number of new developments.
